data.actual_result: Some random things related to the current channel the user is in are copied, as well as some things from the preview, discord settings and the member list if opened
data.expected_result: Not being able to highlight the preview, or copying what's in the preview only
data.short_description: Copying what's in appearance preview copies pretty random things related to the current text channel
data.steps_to_repro: - Be in a non empty text channel - Go in settings/appearance - Highlight the preview, continue highlighting high in the discord window (you can do CTRL + A also) - Copy what's highlighted - Paste it somewhere
